February 10, 2016

The difference between architecture and web

As an architect you learn how to build different kinds of buildings. From garages to skyscrapers and everything in between. When you become a designer or developer for web or mobile, you learn how to code und design for the different devices. In both cases you should ask yourself what impact your decisions and designs can have. Continue reading...
